description:
What is the course about?

This Course explains Odoo (formerly Openerp) Functional concepts.

Odoo is a modern ERP system released under AGPL license, and it offers HR, CRM, Project Management, Sales, Purchases, Inventory Management, Accounting, .....

This Course explains Odoo (formerly Openerp) Functional concepts, and let you understand the concept of many work areas and how you can apply these concept using Odoo (Ex: CRM, Sales, Accounting, Marketing, HR...etc).

Who should be the audience target?why?

This course are designed to start with the high level concept and ending with detailed levels, by other words it covers Odoo warehouse functionality from A-Z by more than 90%, So it target who wants to be Odoo administrators, ERP Functional Consultant, and who wants to apply Odoo for his own business, So it covers all Levels:-

  • High Level.
  • Intermediate Level.
  • Advanced Level.

What kind of materials are included?

The course is presenting as videos which will learn you step-by-step how you can apply and implement Odoo.

How is the course structured?

The course structure depends on functional area
title: Odoo 8 POS Training "Arabic"
